Text: THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!PLEASE KEEP THEM COMING!! IM A DAILY SHOW ADDICT!!!WILL BE WAITING ANXIOUSLY FOR THE NEXT EPISODES!!! :) THANKYOU AGAIN!!!

There may be a few too many pixels for my standalone dvd player. So, divx converter to the rescue.
Keep 'em coming though. Down here in The Antipodes we've lost Mr Stewart from broadcast TV.

THANK YOU SO MUCH cenkota!!! 

EZTV and VTV constantly miss episodes of JonStewart/Colbert. You have made my day with this. 

Please continue to upload these if it is at all humanly possible. Don't make me beg...
